001package edu.pdx.cs410J.phonebill;
002
003import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
004
005import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.*;
006import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
007import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
008
009/**
010 * Unit tests for the {@link PhoneCall} class.
011 *
012 * You'll need to update these unit tests as you build out your program.
013 */
014public class PhoneCallTest {
015
016  @Test
017  void getStartTimeStringNeedsToBeImplemented() {
018    PhoneCall call = new PhoneCall();
019    assertThrows(UnsupportedOperationException.class, call::getStartTimeString);
020  }
021
022  @Test
023  void initiallyAllPhoneCallsHaveTheSameCallee() {
024    PhoneCall call = new PhoneCall();
025    assertThat(call.getCallee(), containsString("not implemented"));
026  }
027
028  @Test
029  void forProject1ItIsOkayIfGetStartTimeReturnsNull() {
030    PhoneCall call = new PhoneCall();
031    assertThat(call.getStartTime(), is(nullValue()));
032  }
033  
034}
